entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 7 April 2023
